column1: Latvian: stikls ‎(“glass”)  Lithuanian: stìklas ‎(“glass”)  Old Prussian: sticlo ‎(“glass”)  Romanian: sticlă ‎(“glass”) / sticlă ‎(“bottle”)
column3: Proto-Slavic: *stьklo ‎(“glass”)  Bulgarian: стъкло ‎(stǎklo)  Czech: sklo  Macedonian: стакло ‎(staklo)  Polish: szkło  Russian: стекло́ ‎(stekló)  Slovak: sklo  Slovene: stêklo  Serbo-Croatian: stàklo / ста̀кло  Ukrainian: скло ‎(sklo)
